system.sustained: Psyker targets a Corpse of Average Size or Larger within range and detonates it, creating a Psychic Blast of Psy Rating Metres Radius that may be dodged as if an Area of Effect Attack. Those that fail to avoid it take 1d10+Psy Rating Damage with Toxic(2), and Tearing Qualities, and must immediately make a Pinning Test. All within line of sight of the explosion except the psyker must make a Fear(2) Test.
